results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እነዚያ እነርሱ በስግደታቸው ላይ ዘውታሪዎች የኾኑት፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እነዚያም በገንዘቦቻቸው ላይ የታወቀ መብት ያለባቸው የኾኑት፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እነዚያም እነርሱ ከጌታቸው ቅጣት ፈሪዎች የኾኑት፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
